Welcome to penguins!¬∂

üêß Penguins: an Easy and NullPointerException-free Gateway to Unpacking and Illustrating NMR Spectra üêß

import penguins as pg

example_spec = pg.read("/opt/topspin4.0.8/examdata/exam2d_HH/", 1, 1)
example_spec.stage(bounds=((9, 0), (9, 0)),
                   colors=("seagreen", "hotpink"),
                   levels=(5e4, None, None)
                   )
pg.plot(); pg.show()
